summary: A utility script that transforms pretrained NCSNPP model checkpoints into the format required by the Hugging Face Diffusers library, mapping attention and residual network weights to a Diffusers UNet model and preparing the associated scheduler and pipeline configuration.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to seamlessly integrate existing NCSNPP checkpoints into Diffusers-based workflows for image generation, reducing the effort needed to adapt legacy models to the modern diffusion pipeline ecosystem.
